definitions: the quality of being unfriendly and unwelcoming towards people

examples.text: pardon my inhospitality, however, it is rather late
a town with a reputation of inhospitality to industry and commerce

shortDefinitions: quality of being unfriendly and unwelcoming towards people

definitions: the state of being harsh and difficult to live in

examples.text: the inhospitality of this environment, a wet and cold place where nothing grows

shortDefinitions: state of being harsh and difficult to live in
